http_header_case.name: Http Header Case
http_header_case.description: HTTP Header Case Attack - changes case of HTTP headers.

http_header_order.name: Http Header Order
http_header_order.description: HTTP Header Order Attack - randomizes order of HTTP headers.

http_header_injection.name: Http Header Injection
http_header_injection.description: HTTP Header Injection Attack - injects fake headers.

http_host_header.name: Http Host Header
http_host_header.description: HTTP Host Header Attack - manipulates Host header.

http_method_case.name: Http Method Case
http_method_case.description: HTTP Method Case Attack - changes case of HTTP method.

http_method_substitution.name: Http Method Substitution
http_method_substitution.description: HTTP Method Substitution Attack - replaces HTTP method with alternative.

http_version_manipulation.name: Http Version Manipulation
http_version_manipulation.description: HTTP Version Manipulation Attack - modifies HTTP version.

http_path_obfuscation.name: Http Path Obfuscation
http_path_obfuscation.description: HTTP Path Obfuscation Attack - obfuscates request path.

h2_frame_splitting.name: H2 Frame Splitting
h2_frame_splitting.description: HTTP/2 Frame Splitting Attack - splits HTTP/2 frames to evade DPI detection.

h2_hpack_manipulation.name: H2 Hpack Manipulation
h2_hpack_manipulation.description: HTTP/2 HPACK Header Compression Manipulation Attack.

h2_priority_manipulation.name: H2 Priority Manipulation
h2_priority_manipulation.description: HTTP/2 Priority Manipulation Attack - manipulates stream priorities.

h2c_upgrade.name: H2C Upgrade
h2c_upgrade.description: HTTP/2 Clear Text (h2c) Upgrade Attack - uses h2c upgrade to bypass HTTPS inspection.

h2_hpack_bomb.name: H2 Hpack Bomb
h2_hpack_bomb.description: HTTP/2 HPACK Bomb Attack - uses HPACK compression to hide payload in headers.

h2_hpack_index_manipulation.name: H2 Hpack Index Manipulation
h2_hpack_index_manipulation.description: HTTP/2 HPACK Index Manipulation Attack - manipulates HPACK dynamic table indexing.

h2_smuggling.name: H2 Smuggling
h2_smuggling.description: HTTP/2 Request Smuggling Attack - exploits h2c upgrade and frame parsing differences.

h2_stream_multiplexing.name: H2 Stream Multiplexing
h2_stream_multiplexing.description: HTTP/2 Stream Multiplexing Attack - uses multiple concurrent streams to evade detection.

h2c_smuggling.name: H2C Smuggling
h2c_smuggling.description:
HTTP/2 Clear Text Smuggling Attack - uses h2c to smuggle HTTP/2 requests
    through HTTP/1.1 proxies and bypass DPI inspection.

h2_hpack_advanced.name: H2 Hpack Advanced
h2_hpack_advanced.description:
Advanced HTTP/2 HPACK Manipulation Attack - uses sophisticated HPACK
    compression techniques to hide payloads and evade DPI detection.

quic_advanced_cid_rotation.name: Quic Advanced Cid Rotation
quic_advanced_cid_rotation.description:
Advanced QUIC Connection ID Rotation Attack.

    Implements sophisticated CID rotation strategies including:
    - Rapid rotation with proper NEW_CONNECTION_ID/RETIRE_CONNECTION_ID frames
    - Variable-length CIDs to confuse tracking
    - CID pools with entropy analysis evasion
    - Coordinated rotation with packet number spaces

quic_advanced_pn_confusion.name: Quic Advanced Pn Confusion
quic_advanced_pn_confusion.description:
Advanced QUIC Packet Number Space Confusion Attack.

    Implements sophisticated confusion techniques:
    - Mixed encryption levels in single datagram
    - Overlapping packet numbers across spaces
    - Out-of-order packet number sequences
    - Phantom packet number spaces

quic_advanced_coalescing.name: Quic Advanced Coalescing
quic_advanced_coalescing.description:
Advanced QUIC Packet Coalescing Attack.

    Combines multiple QUIC packets in sophisticated ways:
    - Mixed encryption levels in single datagram
    - Strategic padding placement
    - Frame reordering within packets
    - Datagram size manipulation

quic_migration_simulation.name: Quic Migration Simulation
quic_migration_simulation.description:
QUIC Connection Migration Simulation.

    Simulates complex migration scenarios:
    - Path validation with challenges/responses
    - Multi-path simulation
    - NAT rebinding simulation
    - Coordinated CID and path changes

quic_http3_full_session.name: Quic Http3 Full Session
quic_http3_full_session.description:
QUIC/HTTP3 Full Session Simulation.

    Simulates a complete HTTP/3 session including:
    - SETTINGS exchange
    - QPACK dynamic table updates
    - Multiple concurrent streams
    - Server push simulation
    - Priority updates

quic_0rtt_early_data.name: Quic 0Rtt Early Data
quic_0rtt_early_data.description:
QUIC 0-RTT Early Data Attack.

    Implements sophisticated 0-RTT techniques:
    - Sending legitimate data in 0-RTT packets before handshake
    - Mixing 0-RTT with garbage data to confuse DPI
    - Overlapping 0-RTT and 1-RTT packet number spaces
    - Using 0-RTT for protocol obfuscation

quic_mixed_encryption.name: Quic Mixed Encryption
quic_mixed_encryption.description:
QUIC Mixed Encryption Level Attack.

    Sends packets with different encryption levels (0-RTT, 1-RTT) in the same
    UDP datagram to confuse DPI packet parsers.

header_modification.name: HTTP Header Modification
header_modification.description: Modify HTTP headers to evade DPI detection

test_cases.name: Basic header modification test
test_cases.description: Test header modification with default parameters

method_manipulation.name: HTTP Method Manipulation
method_manipulation.description: Change HTTP method to evade method-based DPI filtering

test_cases.name: Basic method manipulation test
test_cases.description: Test method change from GET to POST

chunked_encoding.name: HTTP Chunked Encoding
chunked_encoding.description: Use chunked transfer encoding to fragment HTTP body

test_cases.name: Basic chunked encoding test
test_cases.description: Test chunked encoding with default parameters

pipeline_manipulation.name: HTTP Pipeline Manipulation
pipeline_manipulation.description: Send multiple HTTP requests in a pipeline to confuse DPI

header_splitting.name: HTTP Header Splitting
header_splitting.description: Split HTTP headers across multiple TCP segments

case_manipulation.name: HTTP Case Manipulation
case_manipulation.description: Modify case of HTTP headers and method to evade case-sensitive DPI

test_cases.name: Basic case manipulation test
test_cases.description: Test case manipulation with mixed case
